ARABIC: أَئِنَّكُمْ لَتَأْتُونَ ٱلرِّجَالَ شَهْوَةً مِّن دُونِ ٱلنِّسَآءِ بَلْ أَنتُمْ قَوْمٌ تَجْهَلُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Do you come with lust to men instead of women? You are a people who are deeply ignorant.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: You lust after men in place of women. You are indeed a stolid people."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Do you lustfully approach men instead of women? Nay, you engage in acts of sheer ignorance."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Do you have carnal relations with men rather than women? You are ignorant people".
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: “What! You lustfully go towards men, leaving the women?! In fact, you are an ignorant people.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Do you practice your lusts on men instead of women Nay, but you are a people who behave senselessly."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: What! do you indeed approach men lustfully rather than women? Nay, you are a people who act ignorantly.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: What, do you approach men lustfully instead of women? No, you are a people that are ignorant.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Must ye needs lust after men instead of women? Nay, but ye are folk who act senselessly.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Must you go lustfully to men instead of women? Indeed, you are a people who are deeply ignorant."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Would ye go in lustfully unto men instead of women? Aye! ye are a people addicted to ignorant ways.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Do you approach men with [sexual] desire instead of women?! Indeed, you are a senseless lot!’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Would ye really approach men in your lusts rather than women? Nay, ye are a people (grossly) ignorant!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Do you approach men in your lusts rather than women? Nay, but you are a people who behave senselessly."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Do you approach men lustfully instead of women! No, you are an ignorant nation'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Do you lust after men instead of women? You are truly ignorant people.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Do you indeed approach men with desire instead of women? Rather, you are a people behaving ignorantly."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [27:55] What! Do you (read a-innakum, pronouncing both hamzas, or by not pronouncing the second and inserting an alif between the two in both cases) come unto men in lust instead of women? Nay, but you are truly a people in ignorance’, of the consequence of your action.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Must ye needs lust after men instead of women? Nay, but ye are folk who act senselessly) you are folk who ignore Allah's command.
